name: Cupidity
description:
Make the connection!

You are Cupid, using your Arrows of Love to inspire romance in the mortal world! Use the mouse to aim and fire your bow to pierce couples of a matching color. Couples will stay on the screen until you send them to heaven with the space bar. Get as many couples on screen as you can and try to rack up a combo! Make sure you get enough points before time runs out, or it's game over!

Made for Godot Wild Game Jam #21

Design, code, and music by KarratKake

Art by Bradley Boutcher
